channel.title: Whonix Workstation - added repositories
channel.description: I would like to ask if it is safe to add another repository (e.g. kali) to Whonix Workstation (Qubes-Whonix), whether the whole security of Whonix Workstation will be weakened? Or is it better to use pure debian and not change Whonix Workstation at all? If you don't recommend adding anything to Workstation, why?

item.title: Whonix Workstation - added repositories
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
See: Foreign Sources

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

That page

Kicksecure – 20 Feb 22

Install Additional Software Safely

Installing additional Software on Kicksecure ™. Safety considerations.

is generally very much on the topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Workstation - added repositories
item.dc:creator: username5556
item.description:
I would like to ask if it is safe to add another repository (e.g. kali) to Whonix Workstation (Qubes-Whonix), whether the whole security of Whonix Workstation will be weakened? Or is it better to use pure debian and not change Whonix Workstation at all? If you don’t recommend adding anything to Workstation, why?

Read full topic
